articles.title: Lions to select best available player in 2024 NFL Draft - ESPN
articles.description: The Lions believe in the 'best available' draft strategy. They'll look to continue that approach in 2024.
articles.content:
DETROIT -- The Detroit Lions have employed a distinct strategy over the past three NFL drafts.
